string.value: #p1040002# has told you that the entrance to #m910100000# is in #m100040105#. If you want to meet the ghost Fanzy was talking about, head over to #r#m910100000##k. But it seems like the ghost only appears during certain hours... Let's keep track of time since the ghost is said to appear #rfrom 5 p.m. to 7 a.m. of the following day#k.
The ghost of the cursed forest, #t1032107#. He seems to be cursing someone ceaselessly...
Have you found the entrance to #b#m910100000##k, meow?! The entrance is in #b#m100040105##k, meow~meow~! You'll find a strange #bghost#k there, controlling #o5220002#. Go on, now. Hurry~meeeow~

The passage to #m910100000# has been warped so you'll easily spot it~meow~ But the ghost that controls #o5220002# only appears #rfrom 5 p.m. to 7 a.m. of the following day#k so you have to go there during those hours~meeeow~!
Meow...? Are you afraid of the grim forest?
...mumble mumble... \n\r#L0##b(Let's go close and see what the murmuring is about)#l#K
Arwen... Arwen... I cannot forgive Arwen...
You haven't found #b#m910100000##k yet~meow? Roam around #b#m100040105##k, meow. The entrance to the cursed forest is near the warp.
